title: 104_s1332
content: The Act titled "Possessions and Territories Criminal Law Clarification Act" clarifies the application of various offenses to possessions and territories. The Act "Possessions and Territories Criminal Law Clarification Act" amends various sections of title 18, United States Code to include territories, commonwealths, and possessions in the definition of "State." It also clarifies the term "State-chartered credit union" to include credit unions chartered under the laws of states, the District of Columbia, or any territory. The Act "Possessions and Territories Criminal Law Clarification Act" amends sections of title 18, United States Code to include territories, commonwealths, and possessions in the definition of "State." It clarifies the term "State-chartered credit union" to include credit unions chartered under the laws of states, the District of Columbia, or any territory. Amendments include changing references from "State, Territory, or District" to "State, Territory, Commonwealth, Possession, or District" in various sections. The Act "Possessions and Territories Criminal Law Clarification Act" amends sections of title 18, United States Code to include territories, commonwealths, and possessions in the definition of "State." It clarifies the term "State-chartered credit union" to include credit unions chartered under the laws of states, the District of Columbia, or any territory. Amendments include changing references from "State, Territory, or District" to "State, Territory, Commonwealth, Possession, or District" in various sections. Amendments also redefine the term "State" to include States of the United States, the District of Columbia, and any commonwealth, territory, or possession of the United States in specific sections. The Act "Possessions and Territories Criminal Law Clarification Act" amends sections of title 18, United States Code to include territories, commonwealths, and possessions in the definition of "State." It clarifies the term "State-chartered credit union" to include credit unions chartered under the laws of states, the District of Columbia, or any territory. Amendments include changing references from "State, Territory, or District" to "State, Territory, Commonwealth, Possession, or District" in various sections. Amendments also redefine the term "State" to include States of the United States, the District of Columbia, and any commonwealth, territory, or possession of the United States in specific sections. Additionally, amendments are made to Section 102 of the Controlled Substances Act to further define the term "State." The Act "Possessions and Territories Criminal Law Clarification Act" amends sections of title 18, United States Code to include territories, commonwealths, and possessions in the definition of "State." Amendments clarify the term "State-chartered credit union" to include credit unions chartered under the laws of states, the District of Columbia, or any territory. Amendments redefine the term "State" to include States of the United States, the District of Columbia, and any commonwealth, territory, or possession of the United States in specific sections of the Code. The Act "Possessions and Territories Criminal Law Clarification Act" amends sections of title 18, United States Code to include territories, commonwealths, and possessions in the definition of "State." Amendments clarify the term "State-chartered credit union" to include credit unions chartered under the laws of states, the District of Columbia, or any territory. Amendments redefine the term "State" to include States of the United States, the District of Columbia, and any commonwealth, territory, or possession of the United States in specific sections of the Code by adding a new paragraph and amending existing sections. The definition of "State" in title 18, United States Code is expanded to include States of the United States, the District of Columbia, and any commonwealth, territory, or possession of the United States. The Act and its amendments will apply to offenses committed after the enactment date.
